summary: The long awaited customizer for Aurlyn Dawnstone. This customizer contains all the customization options you can expect from my customizers
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center]
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img923/9674/iueNtE.png[/img]

[url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/640x480q90/924/cG7PGI.png[/img][/url]

[size=3][color=#e69138][b][i]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated![/i][/b][/color][/size]

[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Aurlyn Dawnstone looks. You can change the body textures, face and eyes

V2.0.0 has been released. This is intended for V7.0 of Aurlyn. This customizer is only for her default appearance, If you are using one of the alternate appearance packs the changes will not be visible in game. You can however manually install texture from this pack to the alternate appearance.[/size]

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83416/?]Aurlyn Dawnstone[/url][/size]
[size=4]If you plan to use Â TBBP meshes, you also require the following:[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast And Butt Physics[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS [/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE[/url][/size]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]meshes\actors\Character\Aurlyn[/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy all the files to [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\Character\Aurlyn[/color][/i]. The eyes goes into[i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\Character\Aurlyn\Eyes[/color][/i][/size]


[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]
[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body Meshes[/color][/size]

author: ClearanceClarence

files.name: Aurlyn Dawnstone Customizer - CBBE - 2.0.0
files.changelogHtml:
Update to work with latest version of Aurlyn
Updated all textures in the installer to their latest versions
Removed wet body options due to the low res nature
General tweaks to the installer
